passage_text: As a customer of the Poshmark, if you face any query, feedback, complaint or suggestions related to its products and services then you can contact the Poshmark customer service team through its contact detail, email id as well as customer service number that may or may not be tollfree.

Toll free number : +1 (650) 262-4771. Poshmark above mentioned its customer service number where customers can contact to cater their needs. This customer service number may or may not be tollfree and this service is available at 24 hours in all 365 days.

Enforcement: Poshmark may disclose your Personal Data to enforce or apply this Privacy Policy, the Poshmark Terms of Service, or our other policies posted on the Site from time to time or agreements to which you are a party. Your Choices:
Make money from clothes that are just sitting in your closet. List an item for sale in less than 60 seconds. Shop for new and gently used items at prices up to 70% off retail.

customer service number : +1 (650) 262-4771. Email address: support@poshmark.com. Below, we are showing a complaint box, where you can post your experiences, complaints, queries, feedback or any type of problem related to the products and services of the Poshmark.
